first_translate: good grief...

hangle: 용병 다루는 법 같은 걸 왜 물어보는 거야?
first_translate: why are you asking me how I handle my men?
huh?
it’s because his grace asked us to do something for him.

hangle: 난 용병 쪽은 잘 모르니까 물어본 거야.
first_translate: I don’t know much about dealing with mercenaries, so that's why I’m asking.
no... wait.
what did duke abel ask you guys--
oof!

hangle: 이 마차는 왜 갑자기 서는 거야.
first_translate: why is this carriage stopping all of a sudden?
siegren! look at this!
we’re here.
this must be the fourth wall.

hangle: 바로 아벨이 시킨 일을 하러 가야겠어!
first_translate: let’s get going right away since we have work to do!
hm? what’s wrong, siegren?
the step down from this carriage is pretty high.
if you jump off like that, you’ll fall over.
take hold of my hand and come down slowly.
haha.
what are you laughing about?
my bad.
fiona green...

hangle: 나 같은 낯선 소년에게도 잘해주는 이상한 여자애다.
first_translate: ...is such a strange girl who treats even someone as unfamiliar as myself nicely.

hangle: 아직도 그 상냥함과 다정함은 못 믿겠지만
first_translate: even though her kindness still feels unbelievable,

hangle: 피오나에게 보답하고 싶다는 마음 정도는 있다.
first_translate: at least I want to repay her somehow.
thanks for helping me out, siegren.
thanks for helping me out, siegren.

hangle: 아주 조금씩, 이런 사소한 행동이라도 하면
first_translate: maybe if I keep doing these small acts little by little,
I might eventually pay back everything she has done for me someday.
that thought suddenly crossed my mind.
I wanna become kinder too.
I wanna become kinder too.
is this real?
of course.
doesn’t it bear the crest of house abel?
but aren’t you just kids?
this doesn’t make any sense.
go home instead of spouting nonsense, kid!

hangle: 4 성벽에는 날 아는 사람이 없으니까 이럴 만도 하지.
first_translate: well, no one knows me around the fourth wall anyway, so they’d react like this.
excuse me.
you can choose not to believe me or whatever,
but will you take responsibility for your actions afterward?
uh... after reading this document,
it seems like this really is genuine.
all of a sudden he’s using formal language again.
I am lady fiona green.

hangle: 4 성벽의 불미스러운 일을 처리하라는 명을 받고 왔습니다.
first_translate: I came upon receiving orders to deal with some unpleasant matters on the fourth wall.
l-lady fiona?

hangle: 혹시 이게 어떤 불미스러운 일인지는 아는 건지…?
first_translate: do you happen to know what those “unpleasant matters” are?

hangle: 당연하죠. 그 서류에 있는 내용은 모두 숙지했어요.
first_translate: naturally. I’ve read every single thing written in there.

hangle: 정 못 믿겠다면 거기 있는 내용을 전부 읊을 수도-
first_translate: and if you still refuse to trust me, then I could recite its contents aloud--
a-ah, no!
not necessary!
please tell me how I may assist you.
firstly, please let the soldiers arrest the criminals.

hangle: 두 번째로 마을 광장에 사람들을 모아 주세요.
first_translate: secondly, gather everyone together at the town square.
and thirdly...

hangle: 시그렌, 용병들이 주로 어디에서 모이는지 알아?
first_translate: siegren, where do most of the mercenaries usually hang out?
I know.

hangle: 성벽 근처에 있는 주점에 항상 모여 있어.
first_translate: they always meet up at the bar near the walls.
did you hear that? at the bar...
with this, preparations are complete...
he better do a good job despite being a young boy.
just what exactly did duke abel order you to do?
hmm... judging from their future prospects and specific plans,

hangle: 나도 봐줄 생각 없는 데다 아벨의 제스처로 판단하면
first_translate: as well as considering that abel isn’t planning to show them mercy either,

hangle: 뭔가 신체 일부가 잘리는 형벌이 될 가능성이 큰데….
first_translate: then chances are they'll receive a punishment involving cutting off parts of their bodies...
oh... um...
siegren is only fourteen years old.
I shouldn’t say anything yet...
it’s nothing big.
duke abel told me to give fair judgment.

hangle: 어차피 안 따라올 거니까 적당히 둘러대자.
first_translate: anyway, he won’t follow along, so I guess I’ll just beat around the bush.
so you’re not coming with me, right?
I’m gonna tag along.
huh?!
I said I’m tagging along.

hangle: 내가 따라가면 안 되는 일인 거야?
first_translate: or am I not allowed to join you?
w-well, it’s not that...

hangle: 애들이 보기엔 쪼오끔 잔인할 수도 있어.
first_translate: kids probably wouldn’t enjoy seeing it ‘cause it’s kinda brutal.

hangle: 너 내가 전쟁터에서 구르다 온 놈이란 거 잊고 있지?
first_translate: forget that I used to fight wars already?

hangle: …네가 보았던 흉터도 다 예전 거고, 최근에 당한 건 아냐.
first_translate: your scars were also ones you got long ago, not recently.

hangle: 첫 만남이 그래서 못 미더울지도 모르겠지만….
first_translate: although our first meeting wasn’t very impressive...

hangle: 이래 봬도 실력이 나쁜 편은 아니거든.
first_translate: I'm actually quite skilled.
okay, fine.

hangle: 근데 그건 같이 가는 거랑 별개의 일이잖아?
first_translate: but that has nothing to do with whether I accompany you or not.
after all, it’s none of your business, right?
fiona,
that’s not what I meant...
in other words, what I mean to say is...

hangle: 여차할 때 방패막이 정도는 해줄 수 있다는 뜻이야.
first_translate: ...that when things get tough, I can act as your shield.

hangle: 여기 있는 녀석들은 대부분 너한테 호의적이지 않으니까.
first_translate: most people here aren’t favorable toward you.
and two heads are better than one...
now that you understand, let’s hurry up and leave.
h-huh...?
I’m not entirely sure,
but maybe he’s worried about me.
well, if not, oh well.
alrighty, then.
